actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-906.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 4046 to amend the Clayton Act to promote enforcement of the antitrust laws and conservation of judicial resources by clarifying the application of the common law doctrine of collateral estoppel in antitrust litigation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4046 (Collateral estoppel in antitrust litigation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 4046 to amend the Clayton Act to promote enforcement of the antitrust laws and conservation of judicial resources by clarifying the application of the common law doctrine of collateral estoppel in antitrust litigation, and for other purposes.
